arts.ttl: Man City formulate Nico O'Reilly contract tactic as Chelsea seek Cole Palmer transfer 'repeat'
arts.sum: Manchester City youngster Nico O'Reilly is in line for a double-your-money contract at the Etihad Stadium, according to a report.

arts.ttl: Kepa Arrizabalaga breaks silence on Chelsea future as crunch "conversations" confirmed
arts.sum: Chelsea goalkeeper Kepa Arrizabalaga - currently on loan at Bournemouth - confirms that he will be holding talks with the Blues over his future in the next few weeks.

arts.ttl: Kepa Arrizabalaga sets record straight on Bournemouth future as Chelsea talks scheduled
arts.sum: Bournemouth would like to sign Chelsea loanee Kepa Arrizabalaga on a permanent transfer this summer following a successful loan spell this season but the Cherries do not have a buy-option included within the agreement

arts.ttl: Arsenal can sign Cole Palmer 2.0 after David Ornstein revelation
arts.sum: Morgan Rogers is 'generating big admirers,' according to David Ornstein, and the data suggests that Arsenal could be his ideal next step. Arsenal can sign Cole Palmer 2.0 after David Ornstein revelation

arts.ttl: Chances go amiss as Brentford and Chelsea share points
arts.sum: That is one of just three league home matches remaining for Brentford this season and Frank will need to find a way to get his team to rediscover that winning formula on their own turf before the campaign is out if they are to push for a top-half finish. Cole Palmer went close to a last-gasp winner with the final kick of the match as Chelsea were held to a 0-0 draw by west London rivals Brentford .

arts.ttl: Report: Man United scouting 20-year-old Arsenal and Chelsea target regularly
arts.sum: Manchester United are interested in signing the Fiorentina defender Pietro Comuzzo at the end of the season, and they will face competition from Arsenal and Chelsea. According to a report via TMW, Manchester United have scouted the 20-year-old central defender extensively, and they are expected to make a move for him in the summer.
